html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08642021-08-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectOrder Amending Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
PrecisOrder Amending PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT (GGPPA) in order to delete the names of New Brunswick and Ontario from Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the GGPPA, such that the federal Output-Based Pricing System (OBPS) no longer applies in New Brunswick beginning with the 2021 compliance period, and in Ontario beginning with the 2022 compliance period.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0195 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
precis: Order Amending PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT (GGPPA) in order to delete the names of New Brunswick and Ontario from Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the GGPPA, such that the federal Output-Based Pricing System (OBPS) no longer applies in New Brunswick beginning with the 2021 compliance period, and in Ontario beginning with the 2022 compliance period.
